The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 January is 3,341,249 (5,936.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 26 January, there were 174,182 new confirmed cases (309.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 January, there were 247,152 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (72,970 fewer cases).
